FLAVOUR_MESSAGE_3.message: Please select an amount to donate to the GreenWatch, and end the pollution of our galaxy.

FLAVOUR_MESSAGE_2.message: Please select an amount to donate to War Orphan's Support, and end the suffering of children all over the galaxy.

FLAVOUR_MESSAGE_1.message: Peace be with you, brother. Please select an amount to donate to the Guardians of the Free Spirit.

FLAVOUR_MESSAGE_0.message: Please select an amount to donate to the Church of the Celestial Flying Spaghetti Monster.

FLAVOUR_MESSAGE_4.message: Please select an amount to donate.

THANK_YOU_ALL_DONATIONS_ARE_WELCOME.message: Thank you. All donations are welcome.

YOU_DO_NOT_HAVE_ENOUGH_MONEY.message: You do not have enough money.

FLAVOUR_TITLE_4.message: DONATE! Save our species. Stop the carnage of newly settled worlds.

FLAVOUR_TITLE_2.message: FEELING GENEROUS? War Orphan's Support needs your help to keep up its essential work.

FLAVOUR_TITLE_3.message: CONTRIBUTE. The Friends of the Galaxy 'Ban Military Drives' campaign needs your money.

FLAVOUR_TITLE_0.message: DONATE! The Church of The Celestial Flying Spaghetti Monster needs YOUR money to spread the word of god.

FLAVOUR_TITLE_1.message: DONATE. The Guardians of the Free Spirit humbly request your charity to support our monasteries.
